description: Number of ordered ways of writing n as a sum of 4 squares of natural numbers.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..10000
Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
formula: Coefficient of q^n in (1/16)*(1 + theta_3(0, q))^4; or coeff. of q^n in (Sum q^(i^2), i=0..inf)^4.
author: Joe Keane (jgk(AT)jgk.org)
